definitions.text: a highball with liquor and water with sugar and lemon or lime juice
a plaything consisting of a Y-shaped stick with elastic between the arms; used to propel small stones
a shoe that has a strap that wraps around the heel
a simple weapon consisting of a looped strap in which a projectile is whirled and then released
bandage to support an injured forearm; consisting of a wide triangular piece of cloth hanging from around the neck
hurl as if with a sling
hang loosely or freely; let swing

examples: sling the cargo onto the ship

definitions.text: hold or carry in a sling
examples: he cannot button his shirt with his slinged arm
